name: Hunger Apartment （蚀狱）
description: This is Hunger Apartment, a place feeding you, warming you, and satisfying all your fantasies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space
